mainHero.title: Turn feature requirements into
mainHero.subtitle: dev-ready tickets
mainHero.description: Our enterprise-grade contextual LLM automatically converts your high-level feature requirements, user stories, and testing criteria into sprint-ready developer tickets.

items.title: Share and slice your GitHub or GitLab repos
items.description: Select which parts of your repos GitStart can access with GitSlice, our secure git-sharing tool. Share only what you want at all times, and keep your configuration file under your lock and key.

items.title: Tell GitStart about your feature
items.description: Requirements, additional context, UI elements, designs, acceptance criteria, testing scenarios, notes... the more information, the better.

items.title: Tickets are automatically generated in Jira or Linear
items.description: Watch as detailed, context-heavy tickets are populated in your project tracking software of choice. Never miss updating a dependency again. Best of all, GitStart learns and gains more context as it evolves in your codebase: improving results the more you use it.

features.title: Need some more help?
features.subtitle: Let our GitStart engineers turn your tickets into PRs
features.description: We have a unique community of aspiring developers eager to take on new challenges and learn best practices in software development. It's as easy as assigning your Linear or Jira tickets to GitStart. Only pay for PRs you merge!

items.name: Bugs and Tech Debt
items.description: Eliminate long-standing bugs, safely upgrade packages and dependencies, and introduce linters (ESLint, TSLint)

items.name: Frontend Development
items.description: Create or refactor UI/UX components, document design systems with Storybook, improve responsiveness, accessibility, and internationalization, and create interactive graphs and reporting

items.name: Test Coverage
items.description: Increase test coverage with unit tests or end-to-end tests, and introduce new testing libraries

items.name: Backend Development
items.description: CRUD operations on new or existing API endpoints, and CRUD operations on database schemas, models, and interfaces

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
